 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרַע‎</span> ==bow down== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּרַע‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***put one's mouth*** into water, or water-vessel; i.e. kneel to drink ? denominative from following ? — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 miles <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Gen.49.6|Gen 49:6]] + 6 t.; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּֽרְעוּ‎</span> [[Judg.7.6|Judg 7:6]] + 4 t.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכְרַע‎</span> [[Judg.7.5|Judg 7:5]] + 3 t.; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֶכְרְעָה‎</span> [[Ezra.9.5|Ezra 9:5]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכְרְעוּן‎</span> [[Job.31.10|Job 31:10]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּכְרָ֑עוּ‎</span> [[Isa.65.12|Isa 65:12]] 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִכְרָ֑עָה‎</span> [[Ps.95.6|Ps 95:6]] + 6 t. Imperfect; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּרֹעַ‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.54|1Kgs 8:54]] ***participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּרֵעַ‎</span> [[Esth.3.5|Esth 3:5]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּרְעִים‎</span> [[Esth.3.2|Esth 3:2]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּרְעוֺת‎</span> [[Job.4.4|Job 4:4]]. — 

**1.** ***bow*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על ברכים‎</span> to drink [[Judg.7.5|Judg 7:5]]; [[Judg.7.6|Judg 7:6]], in supplication to Elijah [[2Kgs.1.13|2Kgs 1:13]] in the worship of God [[1Kgs.8.34|1Kgs 8:34]]; [[Ezra.9.5|Ezra 9:5]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ברכים‎</span> subject and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of God [[1Kgs.19.18|1Kgs 19:18]]; [[Isa.45.23|Isa 45:23]] without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ברכים‎</span> with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> [[Ps.22.30|Ps 22:30]]; [[Ps.72.9|Ps 72:9]] \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎השׁתחוה‎</span> [[2Chr.7.3|2Chr 7:3]]; [[2Chr.29.29|2Chr 29:29]]; [[Ps.95.6|Ps 95:6]], worship of God, but [[Esth.3.2|Esth 3:2]] (twice in verse); [[Esth.3.5|Esth 3:5]] in obeisance to Haman. 

**2.** ***bow down***, of the couching lion [[Gen.49.9|Gen 49:9]]; [[Num.24.9|Num 24:9]] (both poetry). 

**3.** pregnant with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>, ***bow down over*** (in order to lie with) a woman [[Job.31.10|Job 31:10]]. 

**4.** ***bow down***, of a woman in childbirth [[1Sam.4.19|1Sam 4:19]], so of animals [[Job.39.3|Job 39:3]] idols, removed by enemies [[Isa.46.1|Isa 46:1]]; [[Isa.46.2|Isa 46:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּרְכַּיִם כֹּרְעוֺת‎</span> [[Job.4.4|Job 4:4]] ***tottering*** (feeble) knees; of enemies in death, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפל‎</span>[<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ו‎</span>]<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כרע‎</span> ***bow and fall down*** [[Judg.5.27|Judg 5:27]] (3 t. in verse); [[Ps.20.9|Ps 20:9]] pregnant without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפל‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.24|2Kgs 9:24]]; [[Isa.65.12|Isa 65:12]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת‎</span> [[Isa.10.4|Isa 10:4]]. — 

**Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכְרִיעַ‎</span> [[Ps.78.31|Ps 78:31]] 2 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכְרַעְתִּנִי‎</span> [[Judg.11.35|Judg 11:35]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּכְרִיעַ‎</span> [[2Sam.22.40|2Sam 22:40]] = [[Ps.18.40|Ps 18:40]] ***Imperative*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכְרִיעֵהוּ‎</span> [[Ps.17.13|Ps 17:13]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכְרֵעַ‎</span> [[Judg.11.35|Judg 11:35]]. — 

**1.** cause to ***bow in grief*** [[Judg.11.35|Judg 11:35]] (twice in verse). 

**2.** cause to ***bow down in death*** [[Ps.17.13|Ps 17:13]]; [[Ps.78.31|Ps 78:31]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת‎</span> [[2Sam.22.40|2Sam 22:40]] = [[Ps.18.40|Ps 18:40]].
